biotools.summary: This package defines a "BigMatrix" ReferenceClass which adds safety and convenience to the filebacked.big.matrix class from the bigmemory package. BigMatrix protects against segfaults by monitoring and restoring the connection to on-disk data and it also protects against accidental data modification with a filesystem-based permissions system. BigMatrix provides some optimizations related to attaching to, and indexing into, file-backed matrices with dimnames.
